titleStmt.title: A true relation of those sad and lamentable accidents, which happened in and about the parish church of Withycombe in the Dartmoores, in Devonshire, on Sunday the 21. of October last, 1638

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G[eorge] M[iller] for R: Harford, and are to be sold at his shop in Queenes-head-alley in Pater-noster-row at the guilt Bible,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
